Bidder 4.11: Check for competition: If you suspect that other bidders might also be interested in Implement G, bid slightly higher than your estimated value to create a bidding war. This could push the hammer price closer to your true value, allowing you to win at a lower cost.
Bidder 4.12: Monitor bidding patterns: Keep an eye on the bidding behavior of Bidder 1 and Bidder 2, who have already won items. If they tend to overbid, you might be able to outbid them at a lower price.
Bidder 4.13: Manage risk: If you're unsure about the true value of Implement G, you can bid conservatively and wait for the hammer price to drop. If it doesn't, you can still bid more in the final rounds to secure it.
Bidder 4.14: Stay within budget: Remember that your total budget is $18,000, so don't exceed this limit. If bidding on Implement G requires you to dip into your remaining budget, consider adjusting your strategy or waiting for a better opportunity.
